fileSamples.statement:
(v : val) (ty : typ) (H : match v with
| Vundef => True
| Vint _ => match ty with
            | Tfloat | Tlong | Tsingle => False
            | _ => True
            end
| Vlong _ => match ty with
             | Tlong | Tany64 => True
             | _ => False
             end
| Vfloat _ => match ty with
              | Tfloat | Tany64 => True
              | _ => False
              end
| Vsingle _ => match ty with
               | Tint | Tfloat | Tlong => False
               | _ => True
               end
| Vptr _ _ =>
    match ty with
    | Tlong => Archi.ptr64 = true
    | Tfloat | Tsingle => False
    | Tany64 => True
    | _ => Archi.ptr64 = false
    end
end) : match v with
| Vundef => Vundef
| Vint _ => match ty with
            | Tfloat | Tlong | Tsingle => Vundef
            | _ => v
            end
| Vlong _ => match ty with
             | Tlong | Tany64 => v
             | _ => Vundef
             end
| Vfloat _ => match ty with
              | Tfloat | Tany64 => v
              | _ => Vundef
              end
| Vsingle _ => match ty with
               | Tint | Tfloat | Tlong => Vundef
               | _ => v
               end
| Vptr _ _ =>
    match ty with
    | Tlong => if Archi.ptr64 then v else Vundef
    | Tfloat | Tsingle => Vundef
    | Tany64 => v
    | _ => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else v
    end
end = v.

auto.

(v : val) (ty : typ) (H : match v with
| Vundef => True
| Vint _ => match ty with
            | Tfloat | Tlong | Tsingle => False
            | _ => True
            end
| Vlong _ => match ty with
             | Tlong | Tany64 => True
             | _ => False
             end
| Vfloat _ => match ty with
              | Tfloat | Tany64 => True
              | _ => False
              end
| Vsingle _ => match ty with
               | Tint | Tfloat | Tlong => False
               | _ => True
               end
| Vptr _ _ =>
    match ty with
    | Tlong => Archi.ptr64 = true
    | Tfloat | Tsingle => False
    | Tany64 => True
    | _ => Archi.ptr64 = false
    end
end) : match chunk_of_type ty with
| Mbool =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => norm_bool (Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n))
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint8signed =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 8 n)
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint8unsigned =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n)
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint16signed =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 16 n)
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint16unsigned =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 16 n)
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint32 =>
    match v with
    | Vint n => Vint n
    | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else Vptr b ofs
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mint64 =>
    match v with
    | Vlong n => Vlong n
    | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vptr b ofs else Vundef
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Mfloat32 => match v with
              | Vsingle f => Vsingle f
              | _ => Vundef
              end
| Mfloat64 => match v with
              | Vfloat f => Vfloat f
              | _ => Vundef
              end
| Many32 =>
    match v with
    | Vint _ | Vsingle _ => v
    | Vptr _ _ => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else v
    | _ => Vundef
    end
| Many64 => v
end = v.
fileSamples.proofString: destruct v; destruct ty; destruct Archi.ptr64; try contradiction; try discriminate; auto.

 then None
 else Some (Vint (Int.mods i i0))) = Some z) : exists v : val,

   then None

  | _ => Vundef
  end.

auto.

(E : forall c0 : comparison,
cmp_different_blocks (swap_comparison c0) = cmp_different_blocks c0) (valid_ptr : block -> Z -> bool) (c : comparison) (x y : val) : match x with
| Vint n1 =>
    match y with
    | Vint n2 => Some (Int.cmpu (swap_comparison c) n1 n2)
    | Vptr b2 ofs2 =>
        if Archi.ptr64
        then None
        else
         if
          Int.eq n1 Int.zero &&
          (valid_ptr b2 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs2)
           || valid_ptr b2 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs2 - 1))
         then cmp_different_blocks (swap_comparison c)
         else None
    | _ => None
    end
| Vptr b1 ofs1 =>
    match y with
    | Vint n2 =>
        if Archi.ptr64
        then None
        else
         if
          Int.eq n2 Int.zero &&
          (valid_ptr b1 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs1)
           || valid_ptr b1 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs1 - 1))
         then cmp_different_blocks (swap_comparison c)
         else None
    | Vptr b2 ofs2 =>
        if Archi.ptr64
        then None
        else
         if eq_block b1 b2
         then
          if
           (valid_ptr b1 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs1)
            || valid_ptr b1 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs1 - 1)) &&
           (valid_ptr b2 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs2)
            || valid_ptr b2 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs2 - 1))
          then Some (Ptrofs.cmpu (swap_comparison c) ofs1 ofs2)
          else None
         else
          if
           valid_ptr b1 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs1) &&
           valid_ptr b2 (Ptrofs.unsigned ofs2)
          then cmp_different_blocks (swap_comparison c)
          else None
    | _ => None
    end
| _ => None
end =
match y with

    | Vint n2 => Some (Int.cmpu c n1 n2)

    end
| _ => None
end.

fileSamples.statement:
(chunk : memory_chunk) (v1 v2 : val) (H : inject f v1 v2) : inject f
  match chunk with
  | Mbool =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => norm_bool (Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n))
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint8signed =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 8 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint8unsigned =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint16signed =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 16 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint16unsigned =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 16 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint32 =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint n => Vint n
      | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else Vptr b ofs
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint64 =>
      match v1 with
      | Vlong n => Vlong n
      | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vptr b ofs else Vundef
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mfloat32 => match v1 with
                | Vsingle f0 => Vsingle f0
                | _ => Vundef
                end
  | Mfloat64 => match v1 with
                | Vfloat f0 => Vfloat f0
                | _ => Vundef
                end
  | Many32 =>
      match v1 with
      | Vint _ | Vsingle _ => v1
      | Vptr _ _ => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else v1
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Many64 => v1
  end
  match chunk with
  | Mbool =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => norm_bool (Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n))
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint8signed =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 8 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint8unsigned =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 8 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint16signed =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.sign_ext 16 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint16unsigned =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => Vint (Int.zero_ext 16 n)
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint32 =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint n => Vint n
      | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else Vptr b ofs
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mint64 =>
      match v2 with
      | Vlong n => Vlong n
      | Vptr b ofs => if Archi.ptr64 then Vptr b ofs else Vundef
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Mfloat32 => match v2 with
                | Vsingle f0 => Vsingle f0
                | _ => Vundef
                end
  | Mfloat64 => match v2 with
                | Vfloat f0 => Vfloat f0
                | _ => Vundef
                end
  | Many32 =>
      match v2 with
      | Vint _ | Vsingle _ => v2
      | Vptr _ _ => if Archi.ptr64 then Vundef else v2
      | _ => Vundef
      end
  | Many64 => v2
  end.
fileSamples.proofString:
inv H; destruct chunk; try constructor; try (destruct Archi.ptr64; econstructor; now eauto).
